content.raw:
The tutorial works for me, thanks for all the work. I especially appreciate all the references to other tutorials and the troubleshooting section.

Just a small thing to consider for the future, listing explicit instructions step-by-step in a recipe manner (which can be just copy-pasted without giving much thought to them) tend to benefit new users who are not familiar with the tools and workflow, and beginner English speakers, who may easily get lost in long paragraphs :slight_smile:
